Regulation Name(s): Alkaline phosphatase or isoenzymes test system
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Yumizen C1200 ALP and Albumin reagents for quantitative measurement of alkaline phosphatase and albumin on the Yumizen C1200 analyzer
Indications for Use Summary: Yumizen C1200 ALP reagent is intended for quantitative determination of alkaline phosphatase in human serum and plasma; Yumizen C1200 Albumin reagent is intended for quantitative determination of albumin in human serum and plasma, aiding in diagnosis and treatment of diseases involving liver, bone, parathyroid, intestinal, or kidney function
